ParameterFields.Name: Sector X Coordinate
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
X coordinate on the sea stage of the sector this stage is inside of.
0 refers to the center sector of the map. -3 refers to the westmost sector, and 3 refers to the eastmost sector.

ParameterFields.Name: Sector Y Coordinate
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
Y coordinate on the sea stage of the sector this stage is inside of.
0 refers to the center sector of the map. -3 refers to the northmost sector, and 3 refers to the southmost sector.
